name: Qemu-tracer
body:
## description
A memory tracer done by TCG hack on QEMU. It comes with a configurable cache filter, and python back-end.

## instructions
* ./configure --target-list=x86_64-softmmu --enable-sdl
* make
* x86_64-softmmu/qemu-system-x86_64 -hda [image]
  * Ctrl+Alt+q: start/stop tracing
  * Ctrl+Alt+w: print the most recent 256 requests (for debugging)

## files
* _tracer/_
  * _tracer.h_
  * _config.h_
  * _code_marker.c, code_marker.h_
  * _memory_tracer.c, memory_tracer.h_
  * _sync_queue.c, sync_queue.h_
  * _cache_filter.c, cache_filter.h, lru_algorithm.h_
  * _trace_file.c, trace_file.h, trace_file.py_
* cpu-exec.c
* cpus.c
* cputlb.c
* include/
  * exec/
    * cpu-defs.h
    * exec-all.h
    * softmmu_header.h
    * softmmu_template.h
* target-i386/
  * translate.c
* tcg/
  * tcg-op.h
  * tcg-opc.h
  * i386/
    * tcg-target.c
* translate-all.c
* ui/
  * sdl.c
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
